game.name: Banshee Bash
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, PvP, 스크린 공유 및 분할 PvP, 협동, 스크린 공유 및 분할 협동, 공유 및 분할 화면, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Banshee Bash is a local-multiplayer party game. Fight with up to 3 friends (or add bots) to battle as a team, or in an epic free-for-all. Collect mana and learn spells to cast your way to victory! Games are quick, and will allow you to level up for unlockable cosmetics to add some flair!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Banshee Bash is a local-multiplayer party game. Fight with up to 3 friends (or add bots) to battle as a team, or in an epic free-for-all. Collect mana and learn spells to cast your way to victory! Games are quick, and will allow you to level up for unlockable cosmetics to add some flair!
